Hello I'm Arush, a Product Manager, UX Designer & Software Developer who is Detail Oriented, Tech Savvy, & Analytically Focused. Love to build products that are high-quality, cohesive, and scalable. Have the ability to figure out solutions in the midst of chaos.

Blog

 

About

I am a Digital Product Manager who is Detail Oriented, Tech Savvy, & Analytically Focused. I manage tech teams and facilitate effective communication that ensures maximum visibility of the project to all stakeholders using Lean-Agile frameworks, such as Kanban and Scrum. Have the ability to figure out solutions in the midst of chaos.

Iâ€™m fascinated by what software makes possible, and what you can be capable of if you push yourself and stretch your resources.

My aim is to view the product and its features from the eyes of the user and to create an optimized experience that eases pain points and brings joy.

In free time, I love playing Snooker. Avid reading, exploring the history & culture of various places is my preferred way of learning and making sense of the world.

Availability

I am looking for full-time digital product manager roles in companies that strive to bring about lasting social and technological changes. If you have an idea for a collaboration, hit me up and we could discuss over a coffee!
